newsitem.title: UK: UK s/a M0 rose to 24.51 bln stg in week of Oct 16.
newsitem.headline: UK s/a M0 rose to 24.51 bln stg in week of Oct 16.

text.p: UK M0 money supply rose to 24.51 billion stg on a seasonally adjusted basis, in the week of October 16, the Bank of England said on Monday.
Last week, M0 totalled 24.40 billion stg.
Notes and coins totalled 24.424 billion stg in the latest week, on a seasonally adjusted basis, up from 24.362 billion in the week of October 9.
On an unadjusted basis, M0 fell slightly to 24.332 billion stg in the week of October 16, from 24.352 billion the week before.
